name: Bob the Big Ear Man
description:
Bob the Big Ear Man is a platformer where Bob explores every corner of his house to find wood for his fireplace. He needs to stay warm so he can stay cozy while celebrating the New Year.

He can dash and use his scarf to swing from furniture.

Controls:

  • A/D or Left Stick for horizontal movement
  • Space or the south button to jump
  • W/S or Left Stick to climb your scarf
  • Left Click / Right Trigger to attach to furniture
  • Left Shift / East Button to dash

Made in 48 hours for MelonJam Winter 2022.
